tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sensor_alerts (
    alert_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id UUID,
    sensor_type TEXT,
    reading_value FLOAT,
    reading_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    alert_message TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE alerts (
    alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    alert_message VARCHAR(255),
    sensor_id INT,
    alert_time TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES sensor_readings(sensor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE anomalies (
  anomaly_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_id INT,
  anomaly_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  anomaly_details TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES sensor_readings(sensor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE alerts (
  alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  anomaly_id INT,
  alert_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  alert_message TEXT,
  is_resolved BOOLEAN,
  FOREIGN KEY (anomaly_id) REFERENCES anomalies(anomaly_id)
);

CREATE TABLE AlertRules (
    rule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    rule_name TEXT,
    sensor_parameter TEXT,
    abnormal_threshold FLOAT,
    alert_message TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Alerts (
    alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    rule_id INT,
    sensor_id INT,
    alert_time TIMESTAMP,
    alert_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE Alerts (
    alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    alert_message TEXT,
    alert_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    sensor_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES SensorReadings(sensor_id)
);
